title: Manager Closes
description: A trust-first manager turn that protects the guest experience, resolves friction, and earns a confident next step—without pressure.
objective: Use a structured, low-pressure manager close to clarify truth, resolve concerns, and align next steps—so the guest feels supported and the deal stays clean.
position_in_journey: After Closing With Confidence → Before/During Numbers → Save-A-Deal if needed
learning_outcomes: Run a consistent manager turn that feels supportive, not confrontational.
Diagnose whether the issue is a question, concern, objection, or misalignment.
Use 'Unshakable Facts' to create clarity without pressure.
Resolve the real issue with one clean ask and a clear next step.
Keep team choreography clean: handoff, positioning, and roles.
